analyzed: tasmāt tava eva ātmajaḥ tasya vasudevasya tu kvacid kārye nimitte jātaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ iti
atha prakaṭam uvāca tatas tatas

original: [70] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tad evaṃ paramārter upakaṇṭhatāṃ prāptāyām utkaṇṭhāyām ekadā sarve' narvācīnā vraja-vāsinaḥ sabhāvāḥ sabhāyāṃ militāḥ
analyzed: madhukaṇṭhaḥ uvāca tat evam parama ārteḥ upakaṇṭha tām prāptāyām utkaṇṭhāyām ekadā sarve narvācīnāḥ vraja vāsinaḥ sabhāvāḥ sabhāyām militāḥ

original: militvā ca tad eva sotkaṇṭhaṃ suṣṭhu pratuṣṭuvuḥ /
analyzed: militvā ca tat eva sa utkaṇṭham suṣṭhu pratuṣṭuvuḥ

original: [71] tadā ca tatraikā tāpasī kenacana snātakena samam āyātā /
analyzed: tadā ca tatra ekā tāpasī kenacana snātakena samam āyātā

original: tāṃ ca mahā-prabhāva-lakṣaṇāṃ lakṣayitvā sarve samutthāyātithyam āvitathyena vidhāya vijñāpayāmāsuḥ-sākṣād bhagavato yogamāyeva kā tvam asi
analyzed: tām ca mahā prabhāva lakṣaṇām lakṣayitvā sarve samutthāya ātithyam āvitathyena vidhāya vijñāpayāmāsuḥ sākṣāt bhagavataḥ yoga māyā iva kā tvam asi
śrīmat nāradasya abhinava tanuḥ iva ayam vā kaḥ

original: [72] sā ca sahāsam āha sma-paurṇamāsī-nāmnī kātyāyanī ca kumāra-śramaṇā ca pārikāṅkṣiṇī cekṣaṇikā cāsmi /
analyzed: sā ca sa hāsam āha sma paurṇamāsī nāmnī kātyāyanī ca kumāraśramaṇā ca pārikāṅkṣiṇī ca īkṣaṇikā ca asmi
ayam ca madhumaṅgala nāmā snātakaḥ śrī nārada prakṛtiḥ

original: āvāṃ ca vidyā-viśeṣeṇaitad-vayaskāv eva sadā vidyāvahe /
analyzed: āvām ca vidyā viśeṣeṇa etad vayaskau eva sadā vidyāvahe

analyzed: te ūcuḥ etāvatī kṛpā kṛpaṇeṣu katham asmāsu kṛtā
sā uvāca bhavatām kim api vaibhavam sambhāvya
sarve ūcuḥ kim tat

original: [76] sovāca-bhavatāṃ prāṇa-kandasya śrīman-nandasya jagadānandaḥ sa khalu nandanaḥ sambhaviteti /

original: [77] sarve sa-bāṣpa-pulaka-kulam ūcuḥ-bṛhad-vanam asmākam ida bṛhat-tīrthaṃ bhavati /

original: tasmād asmabhyaṃ datta-viśrāntike kṛṣṇāntike sphuṭam uṭajaṃ tava ghaṭayāmaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt asmabhyam datta viśrāntike kṛṣṇa antike sphuṭam uṭajam tava ghaṭayāmaḥ

original: [78] sovāca-upaśrutir eṣā śruti-veṣā navyāpi na vyabhicaritā /

original: yataḥ kṛṣṇāyā iti vivakṣitam api kṛṣṇasyeti lakṣitaṃ karoti /
analyzed: yatas kṛṣṇāyāḥ iti vivakṣitam api kṛṣṇasya iti lakṣitam karoti
kṛṣṇa nāmā hi bhavitā asau

original: mahā-prabhāvavati yasmin jātavati nirdānavatā pṛthivyāṃ bhaviṣyati /

original: sakiñcanatā viṣaya-sampattau tad-bhaktau tu niṣkiñcanatā ity ādikaṃ viruddhāyamānam api sarvair anuruddhaṃ kariṣyati /
analyzed: sakiñcana tā viṣaya sampattau tad bhaktau tu niṣkiñcana tā iti ādikam viruddhāyamānam api sarvaiḥ anuruddham kariṣyati

original: tasmād asmākam atra sthātum āgraha eva bhavatām anugrahāya sampannaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt asmākam atra sthātum āgrahaḥ eva bhavatām anugrahāya sampannaḥ

original: [79] atha tāṃ sarve sānandaṃ vandamānās tayā samam indīvara-ruci-nindīhita-kālindīṃ vindamānāḥ parṇa-mandiraṃ pūrṇayantas tatra vāsayāmāsuḥ
analyzed: atha tām sarve sa ānandam vandamānāḥ tayā samam indīvara ruci nindī hita kālindīm vindamānāḥ parṇa mandiram pūrṇayantaḥ tatra vāsayāmāsuḥ

original: [80] tasminn eva divase' pagata-doṣe pradoṣe samudbhaṭa-kaṃsa-roṣeṇa jāta-citta-śoṣeṇa kṛta-paridevena vasudevena prahitā vraja-hitā baḍavārohiṇī  #
analyzed: tasmin eva divase pradoṣe samudbhaṭa kaṃsa roṣeṇa jāta citta śoṣeṇa kṛta paridevena vasudevena prahitā vraja hitā baḍavārohiṇī  /

original: yasyām āgatāyāṃ parama-pativratāyāṃ sarva eva vraja-rāja-rāja-samājaḥ śubha-śakuna-saṅkula-śakunādi-samajena samam ullalāsa /
analyzed: yasyām āgatāyām parama pativratāyām sarvaḥ eva vraja rāja rāja samājaḥ śubha śakuna saṅkula śakuna ādi samajena samam ullalāsa

original: tatra cānanda-mohinyau śrī-yaśodā-rohiṇyau yamunā-gaṅge iva saṅgata-saṅge parasparaṃ parebhyaś ca sukha-samūham ūhatuḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca ānanda mohinyau śrī yaśodā rohiṇyau yamunā gaṅge iva saṅga tasaṅge parasparam parebhyaḥ ca sukha samūham ūhatuḥ

original: [81] vraja-rāja-patnī ca tasyā jyaiṣṭham avaṣṭabhya māsa-traya-jātam antarvatnītvaṃ paryālocya svābheda-vedanenaiva śāta-jātaṃ prāpa /
analyzed: vrajarāja patnī ca tasyāḥ jyaiṣṭham avaṣṭabhya māsa traya jātam antarvatnī tvam paryālocya sva abheda vedanena eva śātajātam prāpa

original: [82] atha māgha-māsi cāsita-pratipadi kṛta-sarva-sukha-prasara-janyāṃ rajanyāṃ sā vraja-rājaṃ sevyamānā tandrāparatantrāyamāṇā svapna-tulyatā-saṃcitaṃ  #

original: [83] yathā sa eva bālaḥ sarvatas tad-āvaraṇa-kārikayā kayācic divya-kumārikayātmānaṃ pidhāya vraja-rāja-hṛdayān nija-hṛdayaṃ praviśya dṛśyavad  #
analyzed: yathā saḥ eva bālaḥ sarvatas tad āvaraṇa kārikayā kayācid divya kumārikayā ātmānam pidhāya vraja rāja hṛdayāt nija hṛdayam praviśya dṛśya vat

original: mahā-premavati vraje kṛta-vrajanayoḥ kathā-yogo bhavatoḥ sambhāvyate,
analyzed: mahā premavati vraje kṛta vrajanayoḥ kathā yogaḥ bhavatoḥ sambhāvyate

original: tadā śrī-kṛṣṇa-devasya sarvato varṣyam aiśvaryaṃ gopanīyam ity ato munivarga-prasiddha-garga-siddhāntam evālambya saṃvadiṣyāvahe /
analyzed: tadā śrī kṛṣṇa devasya sarvatas varṣyam aiśvaryam gopanīyam iti atas muni varga prasiddha garga siddhāntam eva ālambya saṃvadiṣyāvahe

original: sa cāmībhiḥ śruta eveti nāścaryāya paryavasiṣyatīti /
analyzed: sa ca amībhiḥ śrutaḥ eva iti na āścaryāya paryavasiṣyati iti

original: [99] prakaṭaṃ covāca - atra khalv idam asya śrī-vraja-rāja-tanūjasya rahasyam udbhāvayato mama samatikramaḥ svayam amunaiva bāḍhaṃ soḍhavyaḥ
analyzed: prakaṭam ca uvāca atra khalu idam asya śrī vrajarāja tanūjasya rahasyam udbhāvayataḥ mama samatikramaḥ svayam amunā eva bāḍham soḍhavyaḥ

original: tathā hi asmin sarvato labdhātirekakā saṃsiddhiḥ khalv ekā vartate /
analyzed: tathā hi asmin sarvatas labdha atirekakā saṃsiddhiḥ khalu ekā vartate

original: yad atikrānta-sarveha-sneha-maya-hṛdaya eva sadā vartamānaḥ snighdatā-digdha-janānāṃ bhāva-mudrayā parokṣaṃ kṛtayāpi svahṛdi pratibimbatatayā  #
analyzed: yat atikrānta sarva īha sneha maya hṛdayaḥ eva sadā vartamānaḥ snighda tā digdha janānām bhāva mudrayā parokṣam kṛtayā api sva hṛdi pratibimba tatayā
mudritaḥ bhavati

original: asya svarūpeṇāvirbhāvaś ca sneha-maya-sphūrti-pūrti-vaśībhāvata eva sarvathā,
analyzed: asya sva rūpeṇa āvirbhāvaḥ ca sneha maya sphūrti pūrti vaśībhāvataḥ eva sarvathā
na tu anyathā

original: putratayāvirbhāve ca bījaṃ pitṛ-bhāva-maya-sneha eva nānyeṣām ivānyat /
analyzed: putra tayā āvirbhāve ca bījam pitṛ bhāva maya snehaḥ eva na anyeṣām iva anyat

original: jāte ca kutracit putratayāvirbhāve tat-tat-sambandha-maya-sneha-kṛta-caya-sphūrtir eva tathā tathā bhāvenāvirbhāve nibandhanaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: jāte ca kutracid putra tayā āvirbhāve tad tad sambandha maya sneha kṛta caya sphūrtiḥ eva tathā tathā bhāvena āvirbhāve nibandhanam bhavati
tat evam sthite sarvatas samudbuddha śuddha pitṛ ādi bhāva vicitrāṇām vraja nṛpati prabhṛtīnām

original: bhṛti-bhuk-paryantānāṃ vraja-janānāṃ yeṣām adhimadhyaṃ prati-dviparārdhaṃ pratikalpam āvirbhavati,
analyzed: bhṛtibhuj paryantānām vraja janānām yeṣām adhimadhyam pratidvi parārdham pratikalpam āvirbhavati

original: vṛddhi-jīvikānām iva teṣām eva prema-sañcaya-paryudañcana-prapañcam añcaṃs tad-vṛddher aparicchedyatābuddhyā pratidātum adhyavasāyaṃ muñcan  #
analyzed: vṛddhi jīvikānām iva teṣām eva prema sañcaya paryudañcana prapañcam añcan tad vṛddheḥ a paricchedya tā buddhyā pratidātum adhyavasāyam muñcan
sadā putra ādi tayā saḥ eṣa virājate

original: nānye tu tatra kila tilam apy avakāśa-kālaṃ labhante /
analyzed: na anye tu tatra kila tilam api avakāśa kālam labhante

original: [101] etad evoktaṃ brahmaṇā eṣāṃ ghoṣa-nivāsinām uta bhavān kiṃ deva rāteti naḥ [BhP 10.14.35] ity ādinā /
analyzed: etat eva uktam brahmaṇā eṣām ghoṣa nivāsinām uta bhavān kim deva rāta iti naḥ bhp  iti ādinā

original: etad eva ca śrī-nārāyaṇa-devena samādiṣṭaṃ - yo' sāv atasī-kusuma-suṣamaḥ sukumāraḥ kumāraḥ ity ādinā / tataś ca -
analyzed: etat eva ca śrī nārāyaṇadevena samādiṣṭam  saḥ atasī kusuma suṣamaḥ su kumāraḥ kumāraḥ iti ādinā tatas ca
tasmāt nanda ātmajaḥ yam te nārāyaṇa samaḥ guṇaiḥ
śriyā kīrtyā anubhāvena gopāyasva samāhitaḥ
iti garga vacana anusāreṇa idam utprekṣyāmahe etad rūpa sva putra mātra paryāpta sarva svārthena

original: śrīmad-vraja-mahendreṇa mahīyamānasya yasya mahābhagavato yā yogamāyākhyā durghaṭa-ghañanī
analyzed: śrīmat vraja mahā indreṇa mahīyamānasya yasya mahābhagavataḥ yā yogamāyā ākhyā
svarūpa śaktiḥ śāstreṇa vaktīkriyate

original: tena kila dattā sā tvat-putre śrī-kṛṣṇa eva paryavasyati sma /
analyzed: tena kila dattā sā tvad putre śrī kṛṣṇe eva paryavasyati sma

original: sā ceha svajana-sneha-nikṣipta-cittasya yadyapy asya tat-putrasya prāyo' vadhānaṃ na prāpnoti /
analyzed: sā ca iha sva jana sneha nikṣipta cittasya yadi api asya tad putrasya prāyas vadhānam na prāpnoti

original: tathāpi tasmād anyasmāc ca parokṣam anukṣaṇam anugatiṃ līlā-sahāyakaṃ ca prapañcati /
analyzed: tathā api tasmāt anyasmāt ca parokṣam anukṣaṇam anugatim līlā sahāyakam ca

original: yathā ca yogamāyā tathā tad-anugatā māyādayo' pīti /
analyzed: yathā ca yogamāyā tathā tad anugatāḥ māyā ādayaḥ pi iti

original: yadyapy evaṃ tathāpi tvat-prabhu-pratta-śaktim enaṃ tvam eva nija-śrī-prabhṛti-śaktibhir gopāyasveti gargo vyañjitavān /
analyzed: yadi api evam tathā api tvad prabhu pratta śaktim enam tvam eva nija śrī prabhṛti śaktibhiḥ gopāyasva iti gargaḥ vyañjitavān

original: tad evaṃ sati bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te [BhP 10.8.15] ity api tad-uktir udriktīsyāt /
analyzed: tat evam sati bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te bhp iti api tad uktiḥ
yatas sva snigdha jana bhajana rasa āveśita āveśa tayā
sadā virājamānasya śrīmat vrajarāja ātmajasya khalu asya sva snigdha jana bhāva svabhāva viśeṣa vinodam

original: anumodamānasya tad-bhāva-rūpānurūpaṃ rūpaṃ yadṛcchāvaśād ekadhānekadhā ca samīpator'samīpato'
analyzed: anumodamānasya tad bhāva rūpa anurūpam rūpam yadṛcchā vaśāt ekadhā anekadhā ca samīpatoḥ samīpatoḥ
pi āvirbhavati tirobhavati ca

original: [102] tataḥ śrī-vasudeva-devakyor antar yac caturbhujam asya rūpaṃ sphurati,
analyzed: tatas śrī vasudeva devakyoḥ antar yat catur bhujam asya rūpam sphurati

original: tad eva hi bahir āvirbhavati sma /
analyzed: tat eva hi bahis āvirbhavati sma
phalena phala kāraṇam anumīyate iti nyāyena

original: tenaiva ca nyāyena śrī-vrajeśvaryos tu paraṃ dvibhuja-mūrtitayā sphūrtir āsīt /
analyzed: tena eva ca nyāyena śrī vraja īśvaryoḥ tu param dvi bhuja mūrti tayā sphūrtiḥ āsīt

original: tataḥ prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya kvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ [BhP 10.8.14] iti dhṛta-tapo-vargasya gargasya vacanam anusṛtya parāmṛśyate /
analyzed: tatas prāk ayam vasudevasya kvacid jātaḥ tava ātmajaḥ bhp  iti dhṛta tapaḥ vargasya gargasya vacanam anusṛtya parāmṛśyate
yadā nṛśaṃsa kaṃsa bhiyā sva āvirbhūta catur bhuja rūpa ācchādana pūrvaka dvi bhuja rūpa āvirbhāvanāya śrī devakī icchā jātā

original: tadā tasya yad apūrvaṃ dvibhuja-rūpaṃ pūrvaṃ māyayā saha śrī-yaśodāyāḥ svāntaram āyātaṃ,
analyzed: tadā tasya yat apūrvam dvi bhuja rūpam pūrvam māyayā saha śrī yaśodāyāḥ sva antaram āyātam

original: tad eva tatra sannidhānam avāpya caturbhujaṃ rūpam antarbhāvya svayam āvirbabhūva /
analyzed: tat eva tatra sannidhānam avāpya catur bhujam rūpam antarbhāvya svayam āvirbabhūva

original: yatra sākāratayā mātṛ-garbha-sthitāpi māyā nirākāratayā tūrdhva-gatyā tanvā tad-vāhanatām āgatā /
analyzed: yatra sa ākāra tayā mātṛ garbha sthitā api māyā nirākāra tayā tu ūrdhva gatyā tanvā tad vāhana tām āgatā

original: gandavāha-śreṇī nīla-kamala-dalam iva tatra sarvālakṣitatayā tat prāpitavatī /
analyzed: gandavāha śreṇī nīla kamala dalam iva tatra sarva a lakṣita tayā tat prāpitavatī

original: yā khalu pūrvaṃ tad-ākarṣeṇa dharṣeṇa paraṃ mātaram api mohena mlāpitavatī /
analyzed: yā khalu pūrvam tad ākarṣeṇa dharṣeṇa param mātaram api mohena mlāpitavatī

original: [103] atha punas tena garbhasthenākāreṇa mātuḥ prasūti-bhramaṃ ca samprathayya bahir ātmanaṃ saṃvalayya prasūti-śayyām evādhiśayya sthitavatī
analyzed: atha punar tena garbha sthena ākāreṇa mātuḥ prasūti bhramam ca samprathayya bahis ātmanam saṃvalayya prasūti śayyām eva adhiśayya sthitavatī

original: yā khalu śrī-devakītaḥ śrī-rohiṇyāṃ saṅkarṣaṇa-saṅkramaṇe' pi tathā prakramate sma iti /
analyzed: yā khalu śrī devakītaḥ śrī rohiṇyām saṅkarṣaṇa saṅkramaṇe tathā prakramate smaḥ iti

original: [104] atra ca snigdhakaṇṭhenāntaś cintitam - satyam evāha sma nūnaṃ athāham aṃśabhāgena
analyzed: atra ca snigdha kaṇṭhena antar cintitam satyam eva āha sma nūnam atha aham aṃśa bhāgena

original: [BhP 10.29] iti hi māyāṃ prati śrī-bhagavad-vākyam ādiṣṭā prabhuṇāṃśena kāryārthe
analyzed: iti hi māyām prati śrī bhagavat vākyam ādiṣṭā prabhuṇā aṃśena kārya arthe

original: sambhaviṣyati [BhP 10.1.25] iti ca devān prati brahma-vacanam /
analyzed: sambhaviṣyati bhp iti ca devān prati brahma vacanam
atra aṃśa bhāgena caturbhuja rūpeṇa ākāra bhedena iti bhagavat abhiprāyaḥ

original: kāryārthe tat-tan-mohanāya aṃśena sambhaviṣyati śrī-kṛṣṇasya dvibhuja-rūpeṇākāra-bhedena saha miliṣyati seti brahmaṇo' bhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: kārya arthe tat tat mohanāya aṃśena sambhaviṣyati śrī kṛṣṇasya dvi bhuja rūpeṇa ākāra bhedena saha miliṣyati sā iti brahmaṇaḥ bhiprāyaḥ

original: tad evam eva hi vyākhyātam anyatra śrī-bhāgavata-tattvavidbhiḥ avatīrṇau jagaty-arthe svāṃśena bala-keśavau [BhP 10.38.32] ity atra svāṃśena  #
analyzed: tat evam eva hi vyākhyātam anyatra śrī bhāgavata tattva vidbhiḥ avatīrṇau jagatī arthe sva aṃśena bala keśavau iti atra sva aṃśena
mūrti bhedena iti

original: [105] api ca śrī-vrajeśvara-sambandha-nibandhanā yā kṛṣṇe yogamāyābhivyaktir uktā sā siddhāntato' pi siddhatām āsīdati /
analyzed: api ca śrī vrajeśvara sambandha nibandhanā yā kṛṣṇe yoga māyā abhivyaktiḥ uktā sā siddhāntataḥ siddha tām āsīdati

original: bhagavataḥ khalu priyajanecchām evānugacchati sarva-śakti-vyaktir na tu yadṛcchām iti /
analyzed: bhagavataḥ khalu priya jana icchām eva anugacchati sarva śakti vyaktiḥ na tu yadṛcchām iti

original: [106] atha sarve sāścaryam ūcuḥ - bhavatu nāma tat tat /
analyzed: atha sarve sa āścaryam ūcuḥ bhavatu nāma tat tat
kintu tatas kim anantaram jātam

original: [107] madhukaṇṭha uvāca - anantaraṃ tu caturbhujatāvirbhāvānurūpyataḥ pravyakta-yogamāyasya
analyzed: madhukaṇṭhaḥ uvāca anantaram tu catur bhuja tā āvirbhāva ānurūpyataḥ pravyakta yoga māyasya

original: tasya prāg-upadeśataḥ śrī-vasudevaḥ sarvatra māyika-śāyikāyāṃ jātāyāṃ pūrva-deva-bhiyā
analyzed: tasya prāc upadeśataḥ śrī vasudevaḥ sarvatra māyika śāyikāyām jātāyām pūrvadeva bhiyā

original: atra tu dvibhuja-rūpeṇa vacanādi-śakter vyakter abhāvena ca tām eva vyajya putratām eva nidehitavān /

prabala pravāha dalita cara bāla vāya ja samavāya ja mañjula añjana kalita tala niścala jala kālindī hrada jāla ja bāla śaivālaka ruci rucira rociḥ valita ārāla ślakṣṇa bāla samudāyam
kamala ālaya ākara kiśalaya sita lasita sita kamala antar valaya dala nirmala vilocanam
vaikuṇṭha sthita kalpataru tallaja pallava kuṇṭha tā kara kara caraṇa adharam

analyzed: tatas yāvat eva yādava deva kula jasya tasya haṭhavat tāyām prayatna adhīḥ āsīt
tāvat graha nigṛhītaḥ iva abhūt

original: mātṛ-vaikalyena kalyamāna-manastve tu prathama-ḍorikā-dvaya-mātra-sambaddha-gātratayā baddha eva so' yam abudhyata /
analyzed: mātṛ vaikalyena kalyamāna manaḥ tve tu prathama ḍorikā dvaya mātra sambaddha gātra tayā baddhaḥ eva saḥ yam abudhyata

original: anyāni tu sarvāṇi dāmāni tasminn urvaritāny evādṛśyanta /
analyzed: anyāni tu sarvāṇi dāmāni tasmin urvaritāni eva adṛśyanta
yogamāyā nāminī tad karma kāriṇī hi tad manaḥ nusāriṇī
yayā tat niṣpādya mātaram prati

original: api bhrama evāyam iti pratyayaḥ pratyaham āsādyata /
analyzed: api bhramaḥ eva ayam iti pratyayaḥ pratyaham āsādyata

original: [41] atha labdha-sandhaṃ taṃ bandhaṃ dīrghatamayānyayā rajjvābadhya ca tayā tad-udūkhala-madhyaṃ babandha /
analyzed: atha labdha sandham tam bandham dīrghatamayā anyayā rajjvā ābadhya ca tayā tat udūkhala madhyam babandha

original: [42] baddhvā ca mātā śikṣāṃ ghaṭayantī nija-kaṭhinatām eva tasmin haṭhini prakaṭayantī tābhir vihasantībhiḥ saha sa-narma-geha-karmaṇe gacchantī,
analyzed: baddhvā ca mātā śikṣām ghaṭayantī nija kaṭhina tām eva tasmin haṭhini prakaṭayantī tābhiḥ vihasantībhiḥ saha sa narma geha karmaṇe gacchantī
tad paripālanāya bālakān paritas sthāpitavatī

original: [43] tataś ca gatāsu tāsu kṣaṇaṃ kṛta-rodana-vinodaḥ,
analyzed: tatas ca gatāsu tāsu kṣaṇam kṛta rodana vinodaḥ

original: paścād bahala-khalaṃ praty udūkhala-nodanāya labdha-modaḥ sa tu baddha eva kevala-bāla-valitatayā
analyzed: paścāt bahala khalam prati udūkhala nodanāya labdha modaḥ sa tu baddhaḥ eva kevala bāla valita tayā

original: prabalita-cāpala-śraddhas taiḥ saha prahasan khelann ulūkhalam etaṃ laghu laghu cālayām āsa,
analyzed: prabalita cāpala śraddhaḥ taiḥ saha prahasan khelan ulūkhalam etam laghu laghu cālayām āsa

original: hārayāmāsa ca tair evolbaṇa-hāsatayā śulva-hāriṇīnāṃ labdha-śūnya-sādharmya-harmya-śreṇyā hāri-śikyita-nava-nava-nītādikam āhārayāmāsa ca /
analyzed: hārayāmāsa ca taiḥ evā ulbaṇa hāsa tayā śulva hāriṇīnām labdha śūnya sādharmya harmya śreṇyā hāri śikyita nava navanīta ādikam āhārayāmāsa ca

original: kintu, tat-karṣaṇa-maya-harṣa-prada-līlayā na ca kareṇa na cāpareṇa tad-uddāna-mocana-rocanatām avāpa /
analyzed: kintu tad karṣaṇa maya harṣa prada līlayā na ca kareṇa na ca apareṇa tad uddāna mocana rocana tām avāpa

original: [44] tatra tu pura-dvāra-purastād-varti vātāvarta-vartita-nartanam iva yamalam arjuna-dvayam asya netra-vartmani vartate sma /
analyzed: tatra tu pura dvāra purastāt varti vāta āvarta vartita nartanam iva yamalam arjuna dvayam asya netra vartmani vartate sma

original: krameṇa cāsau tayor antara eva vikramate sma iti /
analyzed: krameṇa ca asau tayoḥ antare eva vikramate smaḥ iti

original: [45] etāvan mukta-kaṇṭham uṭṭaṅkayan snigdhakaṇṭhas tad-bhañjane kāraṇaṃ harer aiśvarya-pracāraṇam
analyzed: etāvat mukta kaṇṭham uṭṭaṅkayan snigdha kaṇṭhaḥ tad bhañjane kāraṇam hareḥ aiśvarya pracāraṇam

original: iti tat pratārayan kāraṇāntaram eva vyājahāra- [46] tataḥ sphuṭaṃ jhaṭiti parataḥ
analyzed: iti tat pratārayan kāraṇa antaram eva vyājahāra tatas sphuṭam jhaṭiti paratas
paryaṭitum utkaṇṭhayā tad madhya sambaddhena evā adhvanā niścakrāma

original: tad-adhvanas tu saṅkṣiptatayādhaḥ-kṣiptatayā tad udūkhalaṃ pratitaṣṭambhe /
analyzed: tad adhvanaḥ tu saṅkṣipta tayā adhas kṣipta tayā tat udūkhalam

original: [47] atha sphuṭam asau vaṭītroṭanecchayā tat kṛṣṭavān /

haṭhāt ākṛṣṭe ca tasmin
kuṭha dvayam kaṭakaṭa śabda mugja
vighaṭṭitam sphuṭam aluṭhat dvayoḥ diśoḥ
na dhī dhṛtim vadhira vimugdha tām adhi
vrajan adhi vrajam adadhāt prajāvrajaḥ rucirā
citram tutroṭa tat tatra vajra majja arjuna dvayam
na punar mātṛ vātsalya nirbandha maya bandhanam anuṣṭubh
ślokayanti ca atra
śyāma aṅga dyuti kiṅkiṇi dhvani dharam riṅga ati raṅga pradam
karṣat śaśvat udūkhalam khara kharatkāra prakāra pratham
visphūrja pratimā arjuna dvaya kaṭatkāra arjitāt kautukāt
paryāvṛtta nirīkṣaṇam vraja vadhū lālyasya bālyam stuve śārdūla

original: [49] atha tayor atyūrjitena visphūrjitena muhūrtārdham ārtatayā goṣṭhādhiṣṭhānā mūrcchām ṛcchantaḥ sthitāḥ,
analyzed: atha tayoḥ ati ūrjitena visphūrjitena muhūrta ardham ārta tayā goṣṭha adhiṣṭhānāḥ mūrcchām ṛcchantaḥ sthitāḥ
tad nikaṭa saṅghaṭṭinīm arbhaka ghaṭām vinā

original: sā tu tal-līlā-mādhurī-dhurīṇatayā citrākṛtir iva mitrāvalī na vitrāsam āsasāda /
analyzed: sā tu tad līlā mādhurī dhurīṇa tayā citra ākṛtiḥ iva mitrāvalī na vitrāsam āsasāda

original: [50] dūrād api tad-ūrjitaṃ visphūrjitaṃ sambhrama-kāry avadhārya tu vraja-pati-mukhās tarkita-mukhās tad evābhipratasthire /
analyzed: dūrāt api tad ūrjitam visphūrjitam sambhrama kāri avadhārya tu vraja pati mukhāḥ tarkita mukhāḥ tat eva abhipratasthire

original: vinā vātaṃ vinā varṣaṃ vidyut-prapatanaṃ vinā /
analyzed: vinā vātam vinā varṣam vidyut prapatanam vinā

analyzed: tasmāt tasmāt mahā garjāt mūrcchām ārcchan vraje janāḥ iti

analyzed: avadadhire ca tad nikaṭa taṭa stham bhāsamāna hāsa vilāsa mukham ulūkhalam karṣantam līlā sukham varṣantam bāla gopālam
tena ca katham katham
iti kathayantaḥ tam āvṛnvantaḥ eva avatasthire
sa tu pitaram anuvindamānam anucakranda

original: [53] pitā cāntaḥ-sambhrāntaḥ sann api tasya sāntvanāya mukha-mātraṃ hasita-pātram ācarann acirād eva taṃ vipāśayāmāsa /
analyzed: pitā ca antar sambhrāntaḥ san api tasya sāntvanāya mukha mātram hasita pātram ācaran acirāt eva tam vipāśayāmāsa

original: [58] tataś ca khaṇḍitābhyām ābhyāṃ nirgatya kaṭaka-mukuṭa-kuṇḍalādi-maṇḍitau rociṣmad-vapuṣmantau śuṣmāṇau praṇamantau samantād etaṃ kim api  #

original: tābhyāṃ mūrta-paramānanda-pūrtābhyāṃ muhūrtam ekaṃ viśramya ca samyag-īdṛg-auśīra-sukha-dhīra-cetā gavāgamana-ramya-samaye gosthānam āgamya  #

analyzed: udavasitāt atisitām sitām ānāyya tayā sahitam su hitam saha sa vayobhiḥ tanayau stana pāna pratinidhi tayā dhārā uṣṇam payaḥ pāyayāmāsa ca

analyzed: vatsān pulinam āninye yathā pūrva sakham svakam bhp  iti
atha te
ūcuḥ ca suhṛdam kṛṣṇam
svāgatam te tiraṃhasā
na ekaḥ pi abhoji
ehi itas sādhu bhujyatām
tatas hasan hṛṣīkeśaḥ bhyavahṛtya saha arbhakaiḥ

original: darśayaṃś carmājagaraṃ nyavartata vanād vrajam //[BhP 10.14.45-46] iti /
analyzed: darśayan carma ajagaram nyavartata vanāt vrajam bhp  iti

original: [51] carma cedam etāvantaṃ samayaṃ yathāvad eva yogamāyayāntardhāpitam iti gamyam /
analyzed: carma ca idam etāvantam samayam yathāvat eva yoga māyayā antardhāpitam iti gamyam

original: [52] tataś ca saṃvatsara-prasara-vatsa-vatsapāla-bāla-viraha-virahān mahatānandena mahitas tair eva sahitaḥ saṃhita-sampad-vrajaṃ vrajaṃ praviśan,
analyzed: tatas ca saṃvatsara prasara vatsa vatsapāla bāla viraha virahāt mahatā ānandena mahitaḥ taiḥ eva sahitaḥ saṃhita sampad vrajam vrajam praviśan
tat tat unmaryāda vatsa parāvartanāya nidiśan

original: pūrva-pūrvato' py apūrvaṃ parva parvati sma /
analyzed: pūrva pūrvatas pi a pūrvam parva parvati sma
tathā hi uktam
barha prasūna vana dhātu vicitrita aṅgaḥ
vatsān gṛṇan anuga gīta pavitra kīrtiḥ
gopī dṛś utsava dṛśiḥ praviveśa goṣṭham bhp  iti

original: [53] tataś ca pitṛ-sambandhibhir nanda-sūnur iti mātṛ-sambandhibhir yaśodā-sūnur iti tasya nāmānūdya,
analyzed: tatas ca pitṛ sambandhibhiḥ nandasūnuḥ iti mātṛ sambandhibhiḥ yaśodāsūnuḥ iti tasya nāma anūdya

original: sadya eva siddham iti cirantanam api tac-caritaṃ jage / tad yathā-
analyzed: sadyas eva siddham iti cirantanam api tad caritam jage tat yathā
nanda tanū januḥ adya vyālam
hatavān hṛtavān asmad kālam iti
adya yaśodā sūnuḥ vyālam
hatavān hṛtavān asmad kālam iti vā
oṣṭha adharam iha jalada taṭa aliḥ
dambha āvaliḥ api dantakapāliḥ
śvāsa bharaḥ khara dāva ja vātaḥ
jihvā yugam api vartma nipātaḥ
iti utprekṣitatama vividha aṅgān
vyatihāsān ācarataḥ sa aṅgān
ahim anu a hitām kalpayamānān
giriḥ iti tam viśataḥ kṛtamānān
tad udara madhya kṛta abhyanuveśān
nija viraha ādi vimūrcchita veśān
sneha bharāt atha svena sametān
svaka netra amṛta vṛṣṭi sa cetān
tasmāt bahis atha niṣkāsitavān
punar iha nikhilam bata darśitavān
prāṇāt adhikaḥ saḥ yam prāṇān
rakṣan asmān kurute trāṇān
mātrā samaka

original: [54] iti śrutvā ca te vrajasthāś cintayāmāsuḥ,
analyzed: iti śrutvā ca te vraja sthāḥ cintayāmāsuḥ

original: sādhu-ghātukānāṃ pātukānām āmīṣāṃ katham iva jātu kāmāḥ sidhyeyuḥ? iti /
analyzed: sādhu ghātukānām pātukānām ā amīṣām katham iva jātu kāmāḥ sidhyeyuḥ iti
